languages.text: "Жаль, ведь мы были в шаге от вечной дружбы". {n}Фелек горько усмехается, приоткрывая третий глаз.{/n} "Стража!"

traits.locale_text: "Жаль, ведь мы были в шаге от вечной дружбы". {n}Фелек горько усмехается, приоткрывая третий глаз.{/n} "Стража!"

languages.text: "A pity — we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"
languages.original_text: "Жаль, ведь мы были в шаге от вечной дружбы". {n}Фелек горько усмехается, приоткрывая третий глаз.{/n} "Стража!"

traits.locale_text: "A pity, we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"
"A pity, we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"
"A pity, we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"
"A pity — we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"
"A pity — we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"
"A pity — we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"

languages.text: «Qué pena, estábamos a un paso ser amigos para siempre». {n} Felek ríe amargamente y abre su tercer ojo. {/n} «¡Guardias!».
languages.original_text: "A pity — we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"

traits.locale_text: «Qué pena, estábamos a un paso ser amigos para siempre». {n} Felek ríe amargamente y abre su tercer ojo. {/n} «¡Guardias!».

languages.text: "Ein Jammer — wir standen nur noch einen Schritt vor der ewigen Freundschaft." {n}Felek lacht verbittert auf und öffnet sein drittes Auge.{/n} "Wachen!"
languages.original_text: "A pity — we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Jammer — wir standen nur noch einen Schritt vor der ewigen Freundschaft." {n}Felek lacht verbittert auf und öffnet sein drittes Auge.{/n} "Wachen!"

languages.text: « Quel dommage ! Nous étions à deux doigts d'une amitié éternelle. {n}Felek éclate d'un rire amer et ouvre son troisième œil.{/n} Gardes ! »
languages.original_text: "A pity — we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"

traits.locale_text: « Quel dommage ! Nous étions à deux doigts d'une amitié éternelle. {n}Felek éclate d'un rire amer et ouvre son troisième œil.{/n} Gardes ! »

languages.text: “多么遗憾啊，我们离永远不变的友谊只有一步之遥。”{n}费雷克苦涩地笑了起来，睁开了第三只眼。{/n}“卫兵！”
languages.original_text: "A pity — we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"

traits.locale_text: “多么遗憾啊，我们离永远不变的友谊只有一步之遥。”{n}费雷克苦涩地笑了起来，睁开了第三只眼。{/n}“卫兵！”

languages.text: 「残念だ。永遠なる友好関係が結べるところだったというのに」{n}フェレックは苦々しく笑って、第三の目を開く。{/n}「衛兵！」
languages.original_text: "A pity — we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"

traits.locale_text: 「残念だな。あと一歩で永遠に手を結べたものを」{n}フェレックは苦々しい顔で笑って、第三の目を開く。{/n}「衛兵！」
「残念だ。永遠なる友好関係が結べるところだったというのに」{n}フェレックは苦々しく笑って、第三の目を開く。{/n}「衛兵！」

languages.text: "Yazık. Ebedî dostluğumuzun kapısına kadar gelmiştin hâlbuki." {n}Felek, buruk bir şekilde gülüp üçüncü gözünü açıyor.{/n} "Muhafızlar!"
languages.original_text: "A pity — we were one step away from eternal friendship." {n}Felek laughs bitterly and opens his third eye.{/n} "Guards!"

traits.locale_text: "Yazık. Ebedî dostluğumuzun kapısına kadar gelmiştin hâlbuki." {n}Felek, buruk bir şekilde gülüp üçüncü gözünü açıyor.{/n} "Muhafızlar!"
